item.title: Mentioned by London Community News
item.description:
Home News NDP looking to the public for support in saving...
Bookmark and Share. Photo : Sean Meyer. York South-Weston MP Mike Sullivan was in London on Thursday (April 5) to meet with MP Irene Mathyssen (middle), MPP Teresa Armstrong, and others in a roundtable discussion on VIA Rail cuts.

item.title: Mentioned by CTV News
item.description:
Cancer survivor's legal fight for EI sickness benefits drags on

item.title: Mentioned by BlackburnNews.com
item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by London Community News
item.description:
Home News London Layton fans gather for TV premiere of...
Former London poet laureate Penn Kemp, MPP Teresa Armstrong and MP Irene Mathyssen (both representing London-Fanshawe) and Mohamed Salih, candidate for the London West NDP provincial nomination, at Wink's Eatery Sunday (March 10).
